title: Web Scraper
description: Script collecting comments from the European Commission website on a proposal to renew the Covid certificate. Scraped comments were saved to a Mongo DB. Since the comments are created dynamically, I ran a browser in headless mode to read them from the HTML document. I'll create a follow-up project evaluating and visualizing this data.

title: Photo Album Backend
description: Backend application that retrieves image information (URL, description, etc.) from a PostgreSQL database. Simple authentication with a 24-hour access token based on a hash of the correct password plus a random 10-character word. The album itself was a gift to friends and is not publicly visible.

title: Table Comparison Tool
description: Compare table entries based on a unique entry identifier. Files must be uploaded in CSV format and are evaluated using the pandas library.

title: Weather App
description: A vue app displaying weather data retrieved from an express backend that uses the openweathermap API. Sets a random unsplash image of the requested location as the background image.

title: Artist Portfolio
description: Minmalistic artist portfolio. Needs some revision of mobile layout.

title: This Dev Portfolio
description: A simple vue app with a custom design. Uses a workflow to automatically deploy a build on pushing to master.
